column5: Last year on this date I was ice fishing ( 6" of good ice ), on Frenchmans Bay in Pickering. On Saturday I saw a guy in a boat fishing that same spot, how crazy is that.  It's going to be a short season!
I've heard a couple times recentely that we're sposed to be having   a cold, snowy winter so maybe this is just the "calm before the storm"
I beieve Lew's right  , get ready right shortly .
Thanks for the update! I will be shooting for dropping my canoe in there this weekend if I find a partner!
